synopsis.text: Now bearing the prestigious Number Two headband, Afro Samurai embarks on a ruthless quest for vengeance in a dystopian Japan that blends the old and the new. His target: the enigmatic and seemingly invincible Justice, who claimed the life of Afro's father and seized the divine powers of the Number One headband. The rules are clear: only the Number Two can challenge the Number One, but anyone can challenge the Number Two. As Afro navigates a treacherous path filled with relentless adversaries eager to claim his title, he must overcome insurmountable odds to reach the man who shattered his world and reclaim the honor of his family. Prepare for a blood-soaked journey of retribution as Afro Samurai carves his way to the ultimate showdown against the man who became a god by slaying his own father.
